KWAME TANO 
TABLEAU DEVELOPER & DATA ANALYST
Phone: (919) 213-0801 | Email: tanokwame553@gmail.com | Location: Linden NJ
PROFESSIONAL PROFILE
Highly  dedicated,  goal  driven  and  motivated  IT  professional  with  over  6  years  of  robust  experience 
identifying   business   requirements,   driving   process   improvement,   and   designing   IT   solutions   that 
potentiates   business   growth.   Determines   operational   objectives   by   studying   business   functions, 
information  gathering,  evaluating  output  requirements  as  well  as  formats.  Well  vexed  in  performing 
multiple  duties  in  data  analysis,  ETL  development,  data  modeling  and  visual  analytics  leveraging 
Tableau.
